title: Small Horrors: A Collection of Fifty Creepy Stories
description: Lose yourself in fifty chilling tales of horror and suspense from USA Today bestselling author Darcy Coates.Push past the curtains of your rational, safe world and explore the un-nameable horrors living in the darkest corners of our conscience. This is the realm of monsters and shifting shadows, where a single wrong step can plunge you into a terrifying fight for your life, whereâ€¦- Something mimics human voices as it lures you into the woods.- A corpse had gone missing from its drawer in the morgue.- A friend's eyes are unnaturally bright as they approach you in the dark.
author: Darcy Coates
